memorycard: SD (Secure Digital), SDHC, and SDXC memory cards
shutter: 1/4000 - 30 s in steps of 1/3 or 1/2 EV; Bulb; Time (requires optional ML-L3 remote control)
recordingpixelscompression: 1,920 x 1,080, 30 p/25 p/24 p, high/normal 1,280 x 720, 30 p/25 p/24 p, high/normal 640 x 424, 30 p/25 p, high/normal A frame rate of 30 p (actual frame rate 29.97 fps) is available when NTSC is selected for video mode. 25 p is available when PAL is selected for video mode. Actual frame rate when 24 p is selected is 23.976 fps.
lcdmonitor: 7.5 cm (3-in.), 921k-dot vari-angle LCD monitor with wide viewing angle
dimensions: (W x H x D): Approx.128 x 97 x 79 mm
imagesensor: 23.6 x 15.6 mm CMOS sensor;  Effective pixels 16.2 million
flash: Auto modes (auto; auto, flash off ); programmed auto with flexible program (P); shutter-priority auto (S); aperture-priority auto (A); manual (M); scene modes (portrait; landscape; child; sports; close up; night portrait; night landscape; party/indoor; beach/snow; sunset; dusk/dawn; pet portrait; candlelight; blossom; autumn colors; food); special effects modes (night vision; color sketch; miniature effect; selective color; silhouette; high key; low key)
lens: AF-S DX Nikkor 18-105mm f/3.5-5.6G ED VR
interface: Hi-Speed USB, NTSC, PAL, Type C mini-pin HDMI connector
focusing: Single-point AF, dynamic-area AF, auto-area AF, 3D-tracking (11 points)
shooting: 4 fps continuous shooting: enables you to capture fast-moving action at four frames per second.
whitebalance: Auto, incandescent, fluorescent (7 types), direct sunlight, flash, cloudy, shade, preset manual, all except preset manual with fine tuning.
